page.title: 01INDUSTRY IN BURY AREA.
page.content: In the Bury industrial estate there are six factories,five of which are small independent companys.They are{ {Optical}Activities,{Flowers &}Son's,{ {Lilly}Gould,{Monzon}Engineering,{F. Butler Carpentry,{Lynlite}Laminates. Four of these companies were interviewed.Flowers are Agricultural Merchants they sell animal food and fertilizers and chemical products,they also sell beer.Lilly Gould who manufacture blouses have been in Bury since 1968,they moved here because there was a large pool of workers. Lynlite Laminates make concrete beams and have been established in Bury for twenty years.Optical Activities make instruments for the sugar industry they have been here since 1977.They sell their products worldwide except for the Iron Curtain countries.
